name: Escape from haven (Prologue)
description:
This is a prologue to an indie game I designed and made back in University, this game was created for my BA Honours Final Project for Design.  This prologue gives a 40 minutes to an hour experience created fully in RPG maker MV.

The game has you play as Wren, a girl who finds herself trapped on an island, which resembles paradise.  In this prologue,  she awakes to find herself trapped in a strange dungeon due to an even stranger man who found her passed out.  This prologue focuses on helping people, either for good or to give Wren a chance of escaping.  

The prologue has 3 total endings.  I hope you consider purchasing and downloading this game, I'm currently working on the continuation of this game and an indie game I hope to create in Unity, so follow for those and I hope you enjoy.
